channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 4/10/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Fixed issue where WhatsApp message templates could not be retrieved. Fixed issue preventing message updates in SeaContact. 4/2/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated DNC keywords for Spanish. Fixed missing plan title issue in the pricing section. Enhanced outbound and inbound calling via dialpad. Improved outbound call functionality via AI Agent. 3/27/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated “Keywords and Auto-replies” to support WhatsApp messages.
